vote.title: To authorize the Board of Health to modify and increase an existing contract with Emocha Mobile Health for continued contact tracing services for infectious diseases including but not limited to COVID19 and Measles; to authorize the Board of Health to modify and extend the existing contract with Emocha Mobile Health through July 31, 2023; to authorize the expenditure of $795,398.67 from the Health Department Grants Fund for said contract; to waive the competitive bidding requirements of City Code; and to declare an emergency. ($795,398.67)
vote.description: A motion was made by Shayla Favor, seconded by Lourdes Barroso De Padilla, that this Ordinance be Approved. The motion carried by the following vote:
